thread.section_title: Holiday Inn NYC - Lower East Side - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel - Review of Holiday Inn NYC - Lower East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Graham P
title: Lovely Hotel
text: Really friendly and nice staff even allowed us to check in about an hour early result, very clean Hotel lobby and communal areas, hotel room very good modern a little small but for what we were doing just using to sleep and shower it was perfect for the price paid, the bed was superb just the right hardness and quite possibly the best sleep I ever had nice to be able to choose the firmness of the pillow as well all in all great hotel and really great location due to Metro line being a couple mins walk,
